dtliExcerpt: We may not know Betty Boop deeply, but we can agree she has that certain “It” quality that has made her stick around for nearly a century, even if just on lunchboxes. I wish, after seeing this musical, I were closer to identifying why.
showScoreExcerpt: "Unsteadiness in premise can be covered for by verve of execution, which Boop! does find here and there"
